title: JavaScript for Beginners
content: Learn JavaScript programming from scratch. This guide covers variables, functions, and objects.
author: John Doe

title: Advanced JavaScript Concepts
content: Master advanced JavaScript topics like closures, promises, and async programming.
author: Jane Smith

title: Python Web Development
content: Build web applications with Python using Flask and Django frameworks.
author: Bob Wilson

title: Machine Learning Basics
content: Introduction to machine learning concepts including supervised and unsupervised learning.
author: Alice Johnson

title: Deep Learning with PyTorch
content: Build and train neural networks using PyTorch with practical examples.
author: Chris Lee

title: Introduction to Databases
content: Understand relational databases, SQL queries, and normalization techniques.
author: David Kim

title: NoSQL Databases Explained
content: Learn about NoSQL databases such as MongoDB, Cassandra, and Redis.
author: Emma Brown

title: React for Frontend Development
content: Create interactive UIs with React components, hooks, and state management.
author: Michael Green

title: Node.js for Backend Developers
content: Build scalable backend applications using Node.js and Express framework.
author: Sophia Turner

title: REST API Design Principles
content: Learn how to design and implement robust RESTful APIs with proper HTTP methods and status codes.
author: William Scott

title: GraphQL Fundamentals
content: Explore GraphQL concepts and build APIs with flexible queries and schemas.
author: Olivia White

title: Data Visualization with D3.js
content: Create powerful data visualizations using D3.js and SVG.
author: Daniel Evans

title: Cybersecurity Essentials
content: Understand security best practices, encryption, and common vulnerabilities in web apps.
author: Sophia Martinez

title: Cloud Computing with AWS
content: Learn the basics of cloud computing and deploy apps on AWS.
author: James Anderson

title: Docker and Kubernetes
content: Containerize applications with Docker and orchestrate them using Kubernetes.
author: Isabella Carter

title: Java Programming Essentials
content: Learn the fundamentals of Java programming including OOP concepts, data types, and control structures.
author: Michael Brown
